programme.title: Thithikuthey - EP 5
programme.desc: In this tropical twist of Thithikuthey, Chef Anand and Eswari welcome Homebaker Rishivaran, who is set to blend the lush flavors of mango and banana into an irresistible Mango Banana Cheesecake. Their kitchen turns into a playground of flavors, where each ingredient is carefully chosen to complement the rich, velvety cheesecake base.

programme.title: Vaan Varu Vaan - EP 15
programme.desc: VARU, a struggling writer who's trolled for her mediocre stories, is trying to write the greatest love story ever. But each time she tries to write, severe headaches, sleepiness and anything that will make her procrastinate will take over. Meanwhile VIKRAM enters her life. He has loved her from afar as a family friend for many years and now has entered into an arranged marriage alliance with her.

programme.title: Aah! - EP 31
programme.desc: Naren runs a charming little bistro with a spooky reputation. He jokes that it's the haunted atmosphere that attracts customers, but the real secret is his cook, Mother Devi. Her delicious dishes are what truly bring people in. However, Naren has a special talent---he can tell which of his diners are living and which are lingering spirits. Newly hired Priya, the ever-loyal waitress, gets spooked from time to time, but she stays because of her growing affection for Naren.

programme.desc: No one believes that something that happens to us can actually be a blessing. That's what happened to Selamet (Dimas Aditya), a cleaning man at the office who was promoted to become a trusted aide to Rendra (Denny Martin), the boss.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 28
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Ketoprak Spesial Cintanya Gak Ngakal
programme.desc: In his dream, a ketoprak seller is driving around and is nearly hit by a car driven by Devan (Kenny Austin), who looks just like him. The ketoprak seller is confused by his sudden wealth. Meanwhile, a female ketoprak seller is also confused by her sudden wealth.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 48
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Cinta Susu Murni Bukan Kaleng Kaleng
programme.desc: While delivering milk to a cow, Vira meets a boy named Gilang. The two argue because Gilang accidentally almost caused Vira an accident. To apologize, Gilang makes up for it by working on Vira's farm. The two grow closer, and without realizing it, Gilang turns out to be the childhood friend Vira has waited 15 years for and never returned.

programme.title: Cinta Bersyarat Roro Jongrang
programme.desc: Roro Jongrang meets Nando in the forest, but conflict arises when they discover they come from rival families. After a series of tragic events and trials, they decide to marry, but a natural disaster destroys their plans and changes everything.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 48
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Neng Rujak Emang Boleh Ya Segalak Itu
programme.desc: A beautiful girl named Arina (Ersya Aurelia) sells fruit salad. Arina joins a matchmaking app and meets a handsome, long-haired man. Afraid of meeting him in real life, she asks her friend Ria to fill in for her. Initially, Ria refuses, but eventually agrees to meet the man on the app at Arina's insistence. However, a strange incident occurs when Arina is caught impersonating someone else while on the phone with the man.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 502
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KING OF GENDANG TIBA TIBA NIKAH
programme.desc: Denny (Rendy Kjaernett), the drummer, suddenly has to marry Rina Diana due to urgent circumstances. Knowing that Denny has married without telling her, Denny's mother is furious. Moreover, Denny's mother doesn't like Tiwi (Rina Diana). Will Tiwi be able to win her mother-in-law's heart?

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 29
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUPINANG KAMU DENGAN DISUNAT
programme.desc: Hafizah (Larasati Nugroho) saves a man who has been pickpocketed. Because she helped him sincerely, Hafizah refuses to accept any money as a token of her gratitude. Hafizah, who doesn't want to be matched with Rafael, is told to bring a handsome and wealthy boyfriend like Rafael. Confused, Hafizah asks the man who was pickpocketed to use his son, Gio (Rendy Kjaernett), as her pretend boyfriend.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 49
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Jodoh Direview Cinta Yang Viral
programme.desc: Aqila is a very famous vlogger. However, Aqila dresses in Sailormoon cosplay and calls herself Sailorfood. Sailorfood reviews food and tells the truth about its deliciousness, whether it's delicious or not, through live broadcasts.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 503

programme.desc: Redah Kasi Pecah Ekstravaganza musim kedua menampilkan Tauke, Ropi, Zaibo dan ramai lagi meredah kampung-kampung dan melakukan pelbagai aktiviti

programme.desc: Dua selebriti "Gamerz" akan bekerjasama dengan ibu atau bapa mereka untuk bertanding di dalam cabaran permainan video popular seperti Mobile Legends, FIFA20 & banyak lagi!

programme.desc: Drama komedi seram tentang sepasang pencuri bertindak menggunakan seekor tuyul untuk mengembangkan jenayah mereka tapi perancangan mereka membawa mereka bertembung dengan pelbagai hantu yang tak disangka.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 14
programme.desc: Azlan berasal dari keluarga susah yang akhirnya berjaya merantau ke UK setelah mendapat tawaran menyambung ijazah dalam aliran seni. Kisah bermula apabila beliau berjumpa dengan seorang gadis

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Cinta Nikita - EP 1
programme.desc: Laila terkenal di kampungnya berkat vlog yang dimuatnya, sehingga orang di kampung memanggilnya dengan nama Nikita (noNI iKI artis koTA).

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 6
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 2
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 16
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim & Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 3
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.title: Tabung Lawak 2 - EP 26
programme.desc: Tabung Lawak ialah pelbagai klip video pendek untuk menekankan topik-topik hangat dalam cara yang lucu.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 26
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Klik Riders - EP 26
programme.desc: Sebuah program untun tontonan semua.

programme.title: Destinasi Ke Destinasi - EP 11
programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Jaguh Kampung 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: Saksikan para peserta yang mewakili kampung masing masing bertanding dalam acara memasak dengan menu ala kampung.

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 2
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis - EP 11
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2013 - EP 6
programme.desc: Maharaja Lawak Mega kembali dengan penyertaan para pelawak terbaik di rantau ini merangkumi tiga negara Malaysia, Singapura dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Jangan Buat Hal - EP 2
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat Nana Mahazan bersama selebriti popular melatah sambil bermain permainan menarik dan kumpulan manakah yang digelar juara bagi setiap episod.

programme.title: Life At Thinker - EP 10
programme.desc: Life At Thinker adalah sebuah program vlog atau diari yang memaparkan aktiviti-aktiviti menarik dan kegilaan krew-krew Thinker Studios di sepanjang minggu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia X SR2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan & sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan oleh pelawak terkenal Malaysia.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong ? - EP 1
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.title: Karaoke Superstar - EP 6
programme.desc: Sebuah program hiburan yang melibatkan artis dan kelab peminat masing-masing. Kelab peminat dan artis akan bersaing antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat - EP 9
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom game show yang paling tidak adil di dunia dan memang tidak akan adil seperti realiti kehidupan di pejabat andamungkin?

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2024 - EP 5
programme.desc: Nantikan sketsa yang lebih lucu dengan kemunculan tetamu istimewa,dan cameo yang bakal menghiburkan anda semua.

programme.title: Celup - EP 1
programme.desc: Kad kredit Ria tak dapat digunakan ketika mahu membayar barang dibeli dan wang tunai di dalam bank juga tinggal sedikit. Lebih mengejutkan, teman lelakinya juga mahu putuskan hubungan.

programme.title: Fam ILY - EP 5
programme.desc: InikisahkeluargaShahir yangmerupakanseorangkontraktorkelasF bersamaisterinyaMarissa (surirumahsepenuhmasa),anakremajanyaQalisha dananakkecilnyaIman.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories - EP 5
programme.desc: Nusantara merupakan satu daerah yang tebal dengan semangat mistik dan alam ghaib. Setiap episod mempunyai penyelesaian yang unik bergantung kepada jenis gangguan, jenis jin dan kesan ke atas watak utama.

programme.title: Geng Mak-Mak - EP 5
programme.desc: Geng Mak Mak menceritakan kisah seorang bakal ibu, Dahlia yang cuba belajar untuk menjadi seorang ibu yang terbaik untuk anaknya daripada 4 orang sahabat yang juga bergelar ibu.

programme.title: Roda Panas - EP 10
programme.desc: Trend terkini kereta atau motosikal mengenai enjin, roda dan aktiviti yang berkaitan dengan dunia automotif.

programme.title: 1 Hari Bersama Idola - EP 10
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat peminat-peminat yang bertuah menerima kejutan dari selebriti kegemaran mereka.

programme.title: Mini Me Bakes - EP 3
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menampilkan selebriti Malaysia bersama anak-anak mereka di dapur, dengan citarasa Malaysia diselitkan resipi untuk diikuti oleh semua penonton.

programme.title: Eropah, Here I Am
programme.desc: Bukhary membawa diri ke Pulau Leros, Greece dan menjadi sukarelawan membantu pelarian Syiria. Di situ dia mempelajari nilai kehidupan dan kemanusiaan.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Ment 4
programme.desc: Verner calls on his colleagues from sensitive affairs to help his partner, Isabelle. She changed her identity to escape a violent husband, Manotti, who enjoys protected witness status. But he has found her and wants to regain custody of their son Tom.

programme.title: Ma Premiere Vente Des Vins A Beaune
programme.desc: When tradition, heritage and solidarity come together. Since 1859, the Hospices de Beaune wine sale has attracted thousands of visitors. The event helps to fund hospital projects and several charitable works. Dive into Burgundy's fascinating world of grand cru wines.

programme.title: Les Cadors
programme.desc: Antoine, a married man with two children who is a boat driver, and Christian, a single unemployed man who is always getting into fights: two completely opposite brothers. But when Antoine, the perfect husband, gets involved in some dirty business, Christian arrives in Cherbourg to come to his aid and reconnect with him.

programme.title: La Grande Arche
programme.desc: When the austere district of La Defense, a symbol of modernity, becomes the setting for a reflection on architecture, memory, and power.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 11
programme.desc: Off to Montreal to discover the Musee des Beaux-Arts. Guided by meditation, Mathias Bensimon creates profound and luminous canvases. Haider Ackermann expresses the sensuality and eroticism so dear to Tom Ford, while adding a touch of poetry and gentleness. Sculptor Salome Cousseau shapes wood with passion and elegance.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. programme.desc: Gypsy atmosphere with Chico and the Gypsies, who are going to get you dancing and singing along. From rumba Catalana, flamenco, to pop rock, the gypsy universe has something for everyone's taste. A live show filled with everything that has made the group successful for many years...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf

programme.title: Robin Leon Show
programme.desc: Robin Leon, a young singer and German pop star, welcomes his guests on the stage of the Royal Palace in Kirrwiller, Alsace. They come together for a unique and friendly moment, blending dance and music.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 54
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard - EP 30
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions - EP 3
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, emilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Metiers - EP 8
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda - EP 8
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires - EP 25
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires - EP 26
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Triples - EP 1
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'audrey - EP 34
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 32
programme.desc: Pierre-Charles discovers that Flavie looked up how to kiss on the Internet. Vic looks for someone to take him to a party.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager - EP 4
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Bourvil, Le Rire Et La Tendresse - EP 1
programme.desc: Can you really become a star without being a ''loud mouth''? Absolutely, and Bourvil (1917-1970), born Andre Raimbourg, proves it. A self-taught artist from a modest background, right from childhood he was irresistibly drawn to the stage. Song, light opera, theatre, cinema, comedy sketches... We look back at his career.

programme.title: Bourvil, Le Rire Et La Tendresse - EP 2
programme.desc: Bourvil remains forever associated with the phenomenal success of Gerard Oury's films and his unforgettable partnership with Louis de Funes in ''The Sucker'' and ''Don't Look Now''. Possessing many other talents, he traversed the 20th century meeting the right people at the right time.

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 10
programme.desc: In the heart of Mafate, on Reunion Island, lies ilet a Bourse, a hamlet cut off from the rest of the world, from roads and from the hustle and bustle of urban life. Sophie, the local primary school teacher, runs a small class of just four pupils.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 6
programme.desc: Our trip to Latvia continues in the Gauja National Park, a veritable sanctuary of spectacular scenery, followed by a stopover at Rundale Castle, Latvia's Versailles. The tour ends in Liepaja, a vibrant port city, with French teacher Inga Bliska on a guided tour of the Great Amber Concert Hall.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Boss - EP 3
programme.desc: The very first pan-African audiovisual competition for entrepreneurs. For eight weeks, sixteen candidates from all over Africa will be accompanied by four exceptional mentors as they develop their project: Claude Borna, A'Salfo, Nicole Sulu and Yassine Laghzioui. A number of celebrities will also come to talk about their experiences, including champion Teddy Riner.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Breaking down stereotypes, cliches and preconceived ideas, whatever the culture, nationality, sexual orientation, social background... Recounted by Magloire, through his story and the interwoven portraits of others, the series "Rassemblance" shows that integration is possible, that difference is an advantage for the common good, helping us to live together better.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 9
programme.desc: We are all worried about the climate, but we're still not doing enough to solve the problem. Is our psychology acting as a brake on climate action?

programme.title: Ensemble Pour Les Fetes Avec Corneille
programme.desc: In a chalet with an ultra-cozy atmosphere, Corneille invites two exceptional singers, Marie-Josee Lord and Dominique Fils-Aime, to join musicians Kepler Jean-Baptiste and Alexandre Paquette. Garlands, tree, fireplace: everything is set for a memorable moment of music, sharing, and storytelling.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 7
programme.desc: Anything goes when it comes to trying to stop Delpierre's parliamentary bill from progressing. Romain's murky past is used against him. Chloe is sectioned and held against her will in a specialist clinic for her so-called addiction. Claire is in danger and turns to Romain for help.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 8
programme.desc: Romain tells Delpierre he is resigning. Despite everything the latter is determined to make a major modification to his amendment in order to protect it. Bowman obliges Claire to sign a termination of contract together with a non-disclosure clause. The battle seems all but lost...

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag - EP 12
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Caroline Cherie
programme.desc: France, 1789. The Revolution is brewing. In order to ensure the safety of his daughter Caroline, the Comte de Bievres marries her to the sinister lawyer Georges Berthier, future member of the Convention. But the young woman understands nothing of politics and her heart belongs to another, Gaston de Sallanches.

programme.title: Panier De Crabes
programme.desc: A city-dweller in his 30s, who is recovering from burnout, stops next to a wild lake. Whereas he thought that he had found solitude and tranquillity, the place turns out to be not as calm and isolated as it appeared.

programme.title: Mon Quebec, C'est L'hiver
programme.desc: Music, dance and circus: a show that warms the heart! Well bundled up, the biggest names in Quebec music take turns in dazzling scenes at the foot of the Mont-Tremblant slopes, in the heart of the Laurentians.

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: A fusion of dance and music through drums and movement, a collective invitation to an explosive performance, a response to coming down, the descent after ecstasy. A choreographic work by Melissa Guex, with music by Clement Grin.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. programme.title: L'invite

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 11
programme.desc: Off to Montreal to discover the Musee des Beaux-Arts. Guided by meditation, Mathias Bensimon creates profound and luminous canvases. Haider Ackermann expresses the sensuality and eroticism so dear to Tom Ford, while adding a touch of poetry and gentleness. Sculptor Salome Cousseau shapes wood with passion and elegance.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 7
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde shares one of her best addresses for antique hunting in Aisne. She then heads off to the Cote d'Opale to one of the most ''arty'' guesthouses in the region. Last but not least, she tries basketwork with Corinne, the last basketmaker in the region.

programme.title: Taishan, Une Montagne Dans Le Ciel
programme.desc: A natural jewel and an open-air museum, Mount Tai, or Taishan, is also a spiritual home for several religions. During her ascent, Alice Roche reveals, step by step, how this place has become, throughout history, a symbol of peace and national unity in China.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 6
programme.desc: Chef Louise Denisot prepares sauteed chicken with green chili.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 7
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde shares one of her best addresses for antique hunting in Aisne. She then heads off to the Cote d'Opale to one of the most ''arty'' guesthouses in the region. Last but not least, she tries basketwork with Corinne, the last basketmaker in the region.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 23
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 26
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 39
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 4
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 25
programme.desc: The friends Pokou and Boni made in the parallel world arrive to help them: the battle against the rival prince is fierce.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 26
programme.desc: Thanks to Pokou, the battle has been won! All that remains now is for her to return home, surrounded by her faithful friends.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 11
programme.desc: Ilet a Bourse, nestling in the heart of the Cirque of Mafate, is steeped in family lore. A hamlet where several generations grew up together and where few have ever wanted to leave. In harmony with nature, the locals live thanks to a system of mutual help and solidarity.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Les Chefs! - EP 1
programme.desc: For the first challenge, the twelve contestants of this fourteenth brigade must draw inspiration from the arrival of spring. On the menu: a lamb dish with all-green sides.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: The presenter of the programme ''Aux Frontieres du Cosmos'' is found murdered, in mysterious circumstances. With an investigation that seems totally surreal, Greco needs to keep a cool head, particularly when Beretta falls under the charm of the astrophysicist sent to lend a hand, and starts believing in flying saucers.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche - EP 8
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Les Cadors
programme.desc: Antoine, a married man with two children who is a boat driver, and Christian, a single unemployed man who is always getting into fights: two completely opposite brothers. But when Antoine, the perfect husband, gets involved in some dirty business, Christian arrives in Cherbourg to come to his aid and reconnect with him.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 29
programme.desc: A firm favourite at Brighton and Hove Albion, Yankuba Minteh sits down with PL Stories and opens up on his journey from the streets of The Gambia to the pinnacle of the Premier League. We travel to his hometown to meet his parents and those who first recognised his talent, uncovering the roots of his relentless drive and humility. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges he's overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 19
programme.desc: From the training grounds of La Masia, to Stamford Bridge - Marc Cucurella's journey to the top of World Football is a story of self belief and overcomiong adversity. programme.title: FS MMA Jorge Santiago vs. Trevor Prangley
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! A vicious knee to the body ends this fight inside the first round when Jorge Santiago fights Trevor Prangley in San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: WCCB Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Team Form and Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Ryan Rhodes
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Saul (Canelo) Alvarez making his first defense of the WBC light middleweight title, taking on challenger Ryan Rhodes. The bout ends in the final round after a series of unanswered blows. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Hakuho, Goeido, Kakuryu and Takayasu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: Highlights from the 26th Karate Senior World Championships as top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, all converged on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: FS MMA Jorge Santiago vs. Trevor Prangley
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! A vicious knee to the body ends this fight inside the first round when Jorge Santiago fights Trevor Prangley in San Jose, CA, USA.

Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. programme.title: WCCB Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's a space race as Supertato helps Carrot fly her baguette rocket to be the first Veggie on the Cheese Moon but half way there Evil Pea crashes into them making them crash land.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Evil Pea steals Tomato's precious jewel. Supertato ventures to get it back by secretly lifting the jewel from Evil Pea's crown and defeating a crowd of rampaging Mini Peas.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Supertato's dancing is too powerful and too destructive but when he has to face Evil Pea in a dance off to save his trapped friends he soon realises his dancing can save the day.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Supertato runs in fright when Pumpkin tries to make friends with him, but later realises she needs his help as she's stuck in the air hanging from balloons set up by Evil Pea.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Prickly Pear arrives in the Supermarket and tries to take over Evil Pea's freezer. Supertato discovers that Prickly Pear isn't mean at all and just needed some good friends.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Chilli says he's a great skateboarder but when Supertato needs his help, Chilli shows he can't skateboard at all. Chilli turns up the heat and his 'Chilli Rocket' defeats Evil Pea.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 37
programme.desc: There are odd noises in the supermarket. Supertato discovers that Evil Pea and the Mini Peas are asleep and walking through the supermarket. Supertato tries to get them back to bed.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 52
programme.desc: Broccoli screens Supertato: The Movie, but Evil Pea has plans to change the story.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo run a crazy "Hotel" with Dad as their put upon guest. But when Bingo quits over Bluey being too controlling, Dad needs to teach them how to compromise.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad play a game of hand puppets, exploring the land beyond the Blue Mountains where they outsmart the Cheeky Fox to find the softest ever beds.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 8
programme.desc: Dad refuses to be late dropping off Bluey and Bingo at kindy and school, but the girls make Dad play so many games, they quickly derail his plan.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 19
programme.desc: When Bingo drops Mum's breakfast-in-bed on the floor, she's convinced she's ruined her big day. But Bluey helps make amends by putting on a play of how Mum and Dad first met.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 55
programme.desc: A teacher asks Monty to paint something new instead of repeating himself, but Monty thinks repetition can sometimes be useful.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Great-Gran Gran shows JoJo an old family photo - it's fun spotting Gran Gran, Mummy and Great-Gran Gran when they were younger. JoJo recognises some people, but there are lots of members of her family that she's never met before.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran join Julie at the farm for the harvest festival. Julie gives JoJo, Gran Gran and their friends a special tractor ride to the harvesting field, where there's lots for everyone to do.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 36
programme.desc: A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 35
programme.desc: When Sarah forgets her sandwich, her rumbling tummy inadvertently starts a conversation with a Frog.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 16
programme.desc: A bit bored by her surroundings, Emily longs to go on a fun adventure and experience something new and exciting. It's not long before her wish is granted.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 41
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 2
programme.desc: Evil Pea steals Supertato's brand new Tato Car but doesn't realise that the Grape Kids are in the back seat. Supertato has to get the Grape Kids back to safety and save his car.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 52
programme.desc: When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help make his dreams come true?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: King Tiger and the Jelly wonder what Duggee has planned for today. Tag wants a snack, Enid has a musical cheese chase, and Norrie has a haircut.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 29

programme.desc: A beam of light sweeps through the window. Krash finds a glowing ball bouncing in the shop

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 25

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: As Mum goes for a walk along the beach, Bluey runs to catch up with her. Along the way, she has a series of encounters that both excite and test her in her first solo adventure.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 27

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: Evil Pea traps Supertato and demands he tell her the secret of his super strength. Supertato escapes and tells Evil Pea that his friends give him his super strength.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 28
programme.desc: It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.desc: Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.desc: During the Veggies' Super Sidekick Costume Contest, Evil Pea traps Supertato in a jar of honey. All is lost until the Veggies become real super sidekicks, the Tato Team!

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Supertato and the Tato Team must battle to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's earth-shaking stomping performance at the Veg-O-Vision Song Contest.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Supertato invites Evil Pea to his sleepover, but Carrot is suspicious and vows to stay up all night to make sure she can't unleash any of her evil plans.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 9
programme.desc: Supertato and the Veggies have built a super sandcastle, but Evil Pea wants to storm it by firing her hordes of Mini Peas at it with her pea shooter.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: The veggies are playing walkie-talkie hide-and-seek, but Evil Pea steals Carrot's walkie-talkie and uses it to trick the Veggies into getting trapped by the Corn Cobs.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 11
programme.desc: It's Evil Pea's birthday, but she and Carrot are trapped in the bottom of her freezer. They must put their differences aside and work together to escape.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late!

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 13
programme.desc: Evil Pea creates an evil version of her nemesis, Supertato. With the help of her hench-Cobs, Evil Pea makes a big, green lumbering spud that she names Monstertato!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 56
programme.desc: Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: JoJo, Gran Gran and Panda are helping Cynthia in her garden - JoJo loves how tall the sunflowers are. Cynthia gives JoJo a present of some sunflower seeds - JoJo can keep them ready to plant and grow more sunflowers next year.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Great-Gran Gran shows JoJo an old family photo - it's fun spotting Gran Gran, Mummy and Great-Gran Gran when they were younger. JoJo recognises some people, but there are lots of members of her family that she's never met before.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 37
programme.desc: Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 36
programme.desc: A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 17
programme.desc: Lorenzo decides to play a dangerous trick on his loyal coach Beppe.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 41
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 42
programme.desc: When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Supertato and Broccoli go on a pirate adventure with Captain Pak Choi, but they don't realise she intends on plundering Evil Pea's freezer and stealing all her shiny things.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch wants to watch his favourite DVD in peace, so uses his remote control to pause the Rio Carnival in Brazil!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but his daring plan is interrupted by Grandmaster Glitch, who's careering down the mountain in a giant snowball.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S4) - EP 3
programme.desc: Zahra-Rose's dish is Somalian nafaqo, made using mashed potato stuffed with boiled egg.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Andy encounters some baby Lar Gibbons in Thailand that appear to be flying as they swing through the rainforest.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 25
programme.desc: Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments, their super snippets, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Rori is building a castle with building blocks, which intrigues everyone.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: As Mum goes for a walk along the beach, Bluey runs to catch up with her. Along the way, she has a series of encounters that both excite and test her in her first solo adventure.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: Evil Pea blows all the lanterns away during the Lantern Festival. Supertato struggles to get them all back and needs Broccoli's help to save the day.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 61
programme.desc: The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies' gate open and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 1
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'a', and we go on an adventure around the sound. There's an astronaut, some adorable alpacas and an angry alligator!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: Fly is on the lookout for a very special flower known as a rainbow flower. But when Fly's adventure takes her a little too far from Pop Paper City, her friends have to find her and bring her home.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Snowden has lost his pine cone ears. Will Messy and his chums find them in time for his performance in the OKIDO Ice Skating Extravaganza?

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Grand Designs (S21) - EP 9

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how to make a tasty hot pot just using just root vegetables and later cooks up succulent sticky BBQ chicken, corn and slaw. On a drive to stay veggie, Jamie makes veggie enchiladas and guest, Georgina Hayden, makes veggie spinach and tomato rice.

programme.title: More Than A Game
programme.desc: We explore how Abu Dhabi has rapidly transformed itself into one of the world's premier hubs for mixed martial arts. We trace the emirate's journey from building grassroots programs and training centers to hosting global events and forging landmark partnerships with organizations like the UFC. programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: World-renowned abstract artist Julie Mehretu has garnered international recognition for her depictions of the urban experience through her larger-than-life artwork. Her pieces are housed in some of the world's most prestigious art institutions, including the Smithsonian in Washington, D.C., and the British Museum in London. Following in the footsteps of those who paved the way for her success, Mehretu is now helping other creatives thrive.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: We celebrate the nation's emerging athletic talent, from the Olympic 4 400 meters relay team's record-breaking performance to Ross Branch's trailblazing achievements in the Dakar Rally and young tennis sensation Malak Macheng's rise. We follow the relay team's historic silver medal at the Paris 2024 Olympics, Branch's role in putting Botswana on the global motorsport map, and Malak's journey as the 2025 Junior Sportswoman of the Year.

programme.desc: Web Summit has become the must-attend conference in Europe for the tech world. programme.desc: Our waterways often bear the brunt of modern-day human negligence. Most of India's ponds, lakes and oceans are polluted or contaminated due to human activity. For founders, investors, policymakers and startups, it provides a front-row seat for the tech debates that will shape our future. Europe continues to lag behind when it comes to unicorns - while the U.S. has around 800 startups valued at over $1billion, Europe has just over 200 - but that number has been growing with the AI boom, so we sat down with some of those leading lights in the continent's tech scene.

programme.title: Inside...
programme.desc: The Center for Islamic Civilization in Tashkent stands at the intersection of culture, history, and faith. It's a place where Uzbekistan's rich intellectual and artistic heritage meets the possibilities of the future. Through conversations with scholars, curators, and craftspeople, we see how an idea conceived nearly a decade ago has grown into a national center dedicated to rediscovering the spirit of the Islamic Golden Age.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: In southwestern Zimbabwe, art has been a language for millennia. Scattered across the towering hills are cave paintings dating back over 13,000 years. Today, in the rural villages of the Matobos, another vibrant tradition thrives; house painting.

Produced by CGTNs studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the countrys business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xins very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.desc: Featured recipe: Chicken Thigh Kara-age. Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking in five minutes with Chef Rika!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Wisdom of Japan's Gardens
programme.desc: We visit a Kyoto niwashi who designs gardens for temples and private homes and learn how he listens to nature to create gardens that evoke a natural landscape.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan: Izumo
programme.desc: A 140-year-old store sells delicate hand-crafted Japanese confectionery - traditional techniques present floral beauty in sweets, and the seasonal colours of Izumo are shown in time-lapse images.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Disaster training is advancing with digital technology. See how AR/VR technology is helping participants gain realistic experience about the movement of smoke in fires and the risks of a tsunami.

programme.title: Designer-Less Design
programme.desc: Graphic designer Kikuchi Atsuki is drawn to enamelware that reflects the creators' own instincts - he talks about the appeal of designs made and used by the same person.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Sake Truth
programme.desc: We explore various truths about sake from the koji that determines the taste to medieval innovations that changed sake-making. We also examine the science behind why sake changes flavour when heated.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture - this episode looks at words related to mouths. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Higashinada Danjiri involves a parade of decorated floats pulled by teams of veterans and ridden by young performers that lean out over the crowd - 32 districts take part with their own float.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Bon Odori: Rhythm and Connection
programme.desc: The Bon Odori dance, a Japanese summer tradition, has gone global. We look at events held in Malaysia and Brazil and explore the rhythms that bring people from diverse backgrounds together.

programme.title: A Culture Built with Wood
programme.desc: Hida: The Hida region in Gifu Prefecture has some of Japan's most extensive broadleaf forests and has been home to artisans who possess sophisticated woodworking skills like kigumi and wood joinery.

programme.desc: Conducted by Kazuyoshi Akiyama with Akiko Suwanai on the violin, the NHK Symphony Orchestra perform Beethoven's Violin Concerto in D major Op. 61.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Wang Yuan Wei knows what it's like to feel lost - he now offers children from overseas a safe place to call home where they too can say 'tadaima'.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Data centres, the engines of our digital age, consume vast energy and drive a surge in CO2 emissions, intensifying climate risks while powering global connectivity.

programme.title: Designer-Less Design
programme.desc: Graphic designer Kikuchi Atsuki is drawn to enamelware that reflects the creators' own instincts - he talks about the appeal of designs made and used by the same person.

programme.desc: We meet French pastry chef Josselin Rimbod who creates uniquely colourful macarons with local ingredients in Toyama, and German-born Peter Steeger who runs an airfield in Bibai, Hokkaido.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Kaizoku
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea - we explore their history and legacy with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Seto Inland Sea.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Disaster training is advancing with digital technology. See how AR/VR technology is helping participants gain realistic experience about the movement of smoke in fires and the risks of a tsunami.

programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills - watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on 'senpai' in Japan.

programme.title: Bosai: Be Prepared
programme.desc: Winter Fire Precautions: The fact that Japan is dry in winter greatly increases the risk of fire - we learn tips for preventing fires occurring and how to respond effectively when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: IMPACTS uses science and data to convey the reality of climate change. A November series-coinciding with the COP30 summit in Brazil-featured five COP-related shows and an Amazon rainforest special.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture - adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony
programme.desc: Discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden in Uda - here the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule as a sanctuary of local culture and history.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This programme visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: Learn about the autumn chrysanthemum festival and the autumnal equinox (shubun) as the nuns enjoy sushi, salad and dumplings made specially for the occasion.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo mini 5min.
programme.desc: Somen traditional white noodles that are thin like threads - test out and savour the hidden strength of Japan's ultra-thin somen noodles!

programme.title: One in Every Japanese
programme.desc: 1 in 30 Japanese suffer from mental illness - we follow a woman who finds it hard to do simple tasks due to her illness as she goes to rehabilitation for returning to work.

programme.title: Biz Stream
programme.desc: Rehab Reimagined: From home-made activities to interactive digital technology, this episode focuses on different approaches to physical therapy.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programmes from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Admired since ancient times for their beauty, Japanese swords are amazing works of art - this time, one of the 'five greatest swords under heaven': Mikazuki Munechika.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A farm brings together people with something in common: fear of developing dementia. As they engage in planting and harvesting, staff members observe their actions and help them find a way forward.

programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: Discover the story behind the 36 Views of Mount Fuji woodprint series. The Great Wave off Kanagawa by Hokusai is not just a huge wave, and the boat caught in the wave is there for a reason.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition
programme.desc: Beyond Space - Combining Storage with New Services: From hotels to multi-purpose lockers, this episode features innovative storage-based business models.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills - watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on 'senpai' in Japan.

programme.title: Bosai: Be Prepared
programme.desc: Winter Fire Precautions: The fact that Japan is dry in winter greatly increases the risk of fire - we learn tips for preventing fires occurring and how to respond effectively when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture - adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony
programme.desc: Discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden in Uda - here the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule as a sanctuary of local culture and history.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This programme visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A Japanese research team focusing on the fact that people briefly wake up multiple times during sleep helped develop a device to prevent insomnia - this episode shares the latest insights into sleep.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan

programme.title: On the Wings 5min.

programme.title: Where We Call Home

programme.title: Good Job - EP 5
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Destined - EP 40
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant whos suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Lost You Forever Season 1 - EP 1
programme.desc: A drama of mythical ancient times starring Yang Zi and Zhang Wanyi. The drama is adapted from novel titled Miss You Forever by the writer, Tonghua. It tells the story of love and hatred between Xiaoyao and Qiangxuan, Tu Shanjing, Chishui Fenglong and Xiangliu.

programme.title: Ye Cheng - EP 8
programme.desc: Shu Cheng (Claire Jia), the daughter of the first aristocratic family, pretends to be a playgirl to conceal her identify. While promoting Shen Ye (Yuan Hao) as a courtesan, she discovers his multiple identities. They have no choice but to work together.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 30
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Love's Ambition - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] TV host Xu Yan (Zhao Lusi) and urban elite Shen Haoming (William Chan) appear to have a perfect marriage, but it is riddled with secrets. Eventually, they shed their facades, grow closer again, and rediscover themselves.

programme.title: I Kill U - EP 3
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Sun Woo, a down-and-out former athlete, is hired to impersonate Ji Yeon, an heiress involved as a driver in a hit-and-run accident. Drawn into dangerous family power struggles, she is trapped between survival and deception.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 16
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 9
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 27
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 17
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 17
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 10
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 29
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 30
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners.
